channel.title: Outlook on Documentation for Brahim Hamdouni

item.title: How To Forward Outlook Emails With VB Script [EN]
item.description: In Windows, create a certificate via Start > All Programs > Microsoft Office > Microsoft Office Tools > Digital Certificate for VBA Projects In Microsoft Outlook, open the VB editor and copy/paste the code below Replace your@email.here and save Click on Tools > Digital Signature Click on [Choose] and select your certificate Click OK, then save and close the VB editor Create the Outlook rule with [run a script] as action and select your macro That’s all folks !
